roles.flavor: “The power of the fighter. Brute strength.

roles.effect: Once per encounter you can reduce incoming Sync damage to you or a party member by d6.
roles.flavor: “The protection of the companion. Calming presence.

roles.effect: All healing you do or take counts as +2. This counts for items, magical effects, and Rest Dice.
roles.flavor: The majesty of the spirit. Blessed healer.

aspects.name: Alchemist
aspects.effect: Turn this card upright at the beginning of each day. While this card is upright, you can change a single word of a held item, warping its entire construction. Sword can become shield, for instance. Staff of Lightning can become Staff of Flying. After ten minutes, reverse this card. While reversed, the held item reverts to its original form.

aspects.name: Beast
aspects.effect: Turn this card upright at the beginning of each day. While this card is upright you can take the shape of your pet, giving you an animal form. After ten minutes, reverse this card. While reversed, you cannot take animal form.

aspects.name: Berserker
aspects.effect: Turn this card upright at the beginning of each day. While this card is upright, you can enter a berserk mode on your turn and make an additional attack for each piercing you have. Then reverse this card. While reversed, you cannot use this ability.

aspects.name: Knight
aspects.effect: When you make a promise to an NPC, turn this upright. While upright you gain +2 to all rolls while acting for that promise. If the promise is broken, reverse this card. While reversed, you gain -2 to all rolls until the next session.

aspects.name: Magus
aspects.effect: Turn this card upright at the beginning of each day. While this card is upright, you can take on a physical trait from any tattoo on your body. After ten minutes, reverse this card. While reversed you cannot use this ability.

aspects.name: Merchant
aspects.effect: Turn this card upright at the beginning of each day. While this card is upright, you can take a single item within reach into the virtual world. After doing so, reverse this card. While reversed, the item disappears after a single use or at the end of the session.

gifts.name: Horse
gifts.effect: Emerald Pendant. Restore 1 Sync every time you log in.

gifts.name: Bull
gifts.effect: Healing Foil (3). Each card heals d6 Sync, but tears after use.

gifts.name: Crow
gifts.effect: Skeleton Foil. Unlocks any one lock. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Hound
gifts.effect: Death Foil. Stops your first respawn. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Frog
gifts.effect: Fire Foil. Insert into a weapon to deal +3 fire damage for the encounter.

gifts.name: Elephant
gifts.effect: Light Foil. Gain a guiding light to safety. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Wolf
gifts.effect: Dungeon Foil. Removes you and one ally from a dungeon or encounter. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Cub
gifts.effect: Hafgan's Foil. Heals all statuses for you and all allies. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Butterfly
gifts.effect: Lon. A floating orb creature that can hold one item for you.

gifts.name: Goose
gifts.effect: Firebombs (3). Each bomb destroys 3 d4's from an encounter when used.

gifts.name: Fox
gifts.effect: Lucky Foil. Reroll one RNG roll. Tears after use.

gifts.name: Snake
gifts.effect: Bag of Wealth. Start with 3 extra Bytes.
